original_text: At that time the army of the king of Babylon was besieging Jerusalem, and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up in the court of the guard that was in the palace of the king of Judah.
korean_text: 그 때에 바벨론 군대는 예루살렘을 에워싸고 선지자 예레미야는 유다의 왕의 궁중에 있는 시위대 뜰에 갇혔으니

sentences.original_text: the army of the king of Babylon was besieging Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕의 군대는 예루살렘을 포위하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up
in the court of the guard
that was in the palace of the king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 유다 왕의 궁궐 안에 있었습니다
